workDetails.name: Khefue
content: Developed Khefue Inc., an ecommerce platform enabling users and Partners to buy/sell goods like flights, bills, and giftcards, integrating a reward-based system awarding points for purchases. Partners create multiple vendor stores tailored to their needs.

Utilized an SQL database, implemented CI/CD for development, and deployed services on Azure, ensuring scalability. Handled user authentication/authorization with role-based resource access and added password breach alerts.

Implemented comprehensive event logging and introduced cron jobs for background tasks, such as sending birthday wishes and promotion notifications, enhancing user engagement and automating platform operations.
Built a user wallet system as an alternative payment method, supporting card, wallet, points, and hybrid options (card_and_points, wallet_and_points), streamlining transactions across the platform.

workDetails.name: Devheit
content: Built a cross-border payment platform handling transactions across currencies, integrating third-party services for up-to-date exchange rates, ensuring accurate and efficient payment processing.

Engineered an entertainment platform at Devheit, facilitating influencer-brand collaborations by serving as a secure payment gateway. Brands remit payments to the platform, which disburses funds to influencers upon project completion, incorporating password breach protection.
Collaborated on a full-stack financial app managing user accounts and unique IDs for quick info-sharing, contributing to both frontend and backend development alongside a team.
Leveraged Socket.IO for real-time chat between brands and influencers, adopted CI/CD with Docker and GitHub automation, and deployed a microservice architecture on AWS EC2 using ECS and ECR.

workDetails.name: USAF
content: I create smooth user friendly interfaces, provide excellent server-side and client-side logic, smooth integration of web applications with APIs and external libraries, excellent at providing client-side and server-side authentication and application security.
I'm a great team player and I also excel as a standalone. When it comes to transforming designs into real world apps, I pay close attention to details and also input my contributions where necessary.
